channel.title: Maintenance Phase (Pirate)
channel.description: Personal RSS feed for Maintenance Phase bonus episodes.

item.title: Right Reasons: Aubrey Tells Mike About "The Bachelor"
item.description:
As you may have heard on yesterday's episode, we're finally going to start offering bonus episodes! You've all been supporting us for nothing whatsoever and it's about time we started giving back. Thanks for being here.
We have no idea what form these will take in the future, but for the last few months we've been steadily building a list of Rantathons -- topics that come up while we're recording and one of us has to say, "omg stop me, I could go on about this about this for hours."
We are ranty people and this happens a lot; it's already quite a list. Today's bonus episode started out as an extended tangent in our Halo Top episode and became a perennial conversation topic whenever we had a few minutes to kill. Eventually we thought, hey we're gonna talk about this anyway, why not record it?
So here it is: Aubrey's guided tour through the flora and fauna of the Bachelor/Bachelorette/Bachelor in Paradise universe. Disclaimer: We recorded this about two months ago, and there has been a *lot* happening in Bachelor world since then. We're already planning a follow-up.

item.title: Consciously Uncoupled: Harry, Meghan and Oprah (and Piers)
item.description:
It's bonus episode time, team!
To go along with our recent Oprahsodes, today's bonus episode is all about Harry, Meghan, Oprah, and the British royal family. And it's a double bonus because we're joined by your favorite and ours, Kimberly Springer! Along the way, we talk about Oprah's role as an early parasocial fave, Piers Morgan's absolute horseshit and the class implications of cutting toast.
As ever, you can play today's episode directly through Patreon, or you can use our RSS feed to add it to your podcast app. Here are the instructions from Patreon.
If you've got particular topics you'd love to see us cover on these bonus episodes--conversations that don't quite fit the main feed's focus on wellness and weight loss--feel free to leave those in the comments. We'd love to hear them!
We are overwhelmed and overjoyed that so many of you all are enjoying the show. Thank you so much for all your support, maintainers. It means the world.
See you in July!
A&M

item.title: April Bonus: MAHA's First 90 Days
item.description:

item.title: June Bonus: Mike Takes Aubrey to "Temptation Island"
item.description:
WE DID IT, FOLKS! We made Mike watch reality TV! This month, based on your suggestions, we're taking a break from the hellscape that surrounds us to talk about the hellscapes on TV: TEMPTATION ISLAND and THE ULTIMATUM: QUEER LOVE. A couple of links:
Video speed controller for chrome / Global Speed for chrome
Tiff & Sam's dog argument
You can play the episode directly through Patreon or use our RSS feed to add it to your podcast app. Here are the instructions from Patreon. And if you've got bonus episode requests, as ever, drop them in the comments!
See you next month!

item.title: July Bonus: Mike Huckabee's Diet Book
item.description:
You may know Mike Huckabee as the former Governor of Arkansas, the current US Ambassador to Israel, or as a sick bassist, but did you also know he wrote a diet book? On this month's bonus episode, we're diving into "Quit Digging Your Grave With a Knife and Fork" and the conflicted world of a former fat guy who's also a high-profile conservative.
Links!:
National Governors Association - Mike Huckabee
The New Yorker - Prodigal Son
Mike Huckabee Lost 110 Pounds, Ask Him How - NYT
Getting Religion About Health - Salon
The Slenderized Governor with Advice to Share - NYT
Mike Huckabee Has Resumed Digging His Grave with a Knife and Fork - The Stranger
Arkansas led the nation in measuring obesity in kids. Did it help? - NPR
You can play the episode directly through Patreon or use our RSS feed to add it to your podcast app. Here are the instructions from Patreon. And if you've got bonus episode requests, as ever, drop them in the comments!
See you next month!
M&A

item.title: August Bonus: Gwyneth, The Biography
item.description:
Light your scented candles and grab your jade eggs: We're returning to the Goopiverse! This month, Aubrey walks us through the high points of the new Gwyneth Paltrow biography.
You can play the episode directly through Patreon or use our RSS feed to add it to your podcast app. Here are the instructions from Patreon. And if you've got bonus episode requests, as ever, drop them in the comments!

item.title: September Bonus: Checking in on MAHA, Kratom and Jillian Michaels
item.description:
This month we're walking through some recent news stories:
What's RFK Jr. Up To? (we recorded this before the "Tylenol causes autism" madness so we'll have to cover that next roundup)
The Rise of Kratom (NBC News, FDA, CNN, WVXU, GQ, Toxicology, mental health, kratom as an opioid alternative)
Jillian Michaels Profiled By the New York Times
You can play the episode directly through Patreon or use our RSS feed to add it to your podcast app. Here are the instructions from Patreon.
See you next month!
A&M
